discovery_rule.name: ZFS dataset discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover ZFS datasets. Dataset names must contain a "/" else it's a zpool root.

item_prototype.name: Zpool {#POOLNAME} available
item_prototype.description: Yes, the zpool name is also the first dataset, so we can get info from zfs.dataset.info.

item_prototype.name: Zpool {#POOLNAME} used
item_prototype.description: Yes, the zpool name is also the first dataset, so we can get info from zfs.dataset.info.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.dataset.info[{#POOLNAME},available].last()}*100/({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.dataset.info[{#POOLNAME},available].last()}+{Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.dataset.info[{#POOLNAME},used].last()}))<2
trigger_prototype.name: Zpool {#POOLNAME} on {HOST.NAME} has less than $2% space

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.dataset.info[{#POOLNAME},available].last()}*100/({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.dataset.info[{#POOLNAME},available].last()}+{Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.dataset.info[{#POOLNAME},used].last()}))<10
trigger_prototype.name: Zpool {#POOLNAME} on {HOST.NAME} has less than $2% space

trigger.expression: {Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.file.last()}<>{Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.sys.last()}
trigger.name: ZFS arc max config is not applied on {HOST.NAME} (conf={ITEM.LASTVALUE1}, sys={ITEM.LASTVALUE2})
trigger.description: If the zfs_arc_max is not configured, it's 0 both in the config and the system. But that problem is picked up by the other trigger that wants the max between 3% and 85%.

trigger.expression: ({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.syspromille.last()}<30 or {Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.syspromille.last()}>850)
trigger.name: ZFS arc max {ITEM.VALUE} not between 30 %o and 850 %o on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Herman says (2017-05-03): "sp servers hebben vaak tot 80% ofzo aan ARC. pve nodes hebben van de 128GB, 4GB tot 32GB aan ARC", i.e. 3%..85%.

trigger.expression: ({Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.syspromille.last()}<100 or {Template OSSO Disk ZFS:zfs.arc.max.syspromille.last()}>850)
trigger.name: ZFS arc max {ITEM.VALUE} not between 100 %o and 850 %o on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Clone of the 30%o trigger, for kubernetes we would like to have at least 10% of arc cache memory, leaving the upper max the same for sp nodes usecase
